entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is able to cast spells and has a wand.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts, who is able to cast spells and has a wand. He is also a close friend of Harry's.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, who is mentioned as being unable to put things right.

entities.name: bowtruckle
entities.description: A type of magical creature that Hagrid was binding up when the fire started.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Dumbledore's inability to put things right.
Hagrid was caring for the Bowtruckles when the fire started.
